metadata.title: The Circumstances of the Classic Lit Club's Scion

tracks.text: At the Pineapple Sand coffee shop, Hotaro stares, mouth open, at Chitanda, who averts her eyes. A nearby clock's pendulum now has a heart shape.
She blushes. Hotaro starts.
The man behind the bar holds up a hand, and turns around.
A strand of hair falls over her face. Her fingers grip her dress. The heart pendulum glistens.
He looks to the side.
The clock pendulum is back to normal.
The server brings coffee.
Hotaro lifts his coffee cup and blows on it.
She looks at him, and smiles softly. Her floral, scalloped cup is full. Hotaro's simple, white cup is half full. The shop has eclectic, warm lights. A poster reads Kamiyama Festival.
She nods, sadly.
In a fantasy sequence, Hotaro sits on a park bench. Young Chitanda digs a shallow hole with her hands. Then a second. Then a 20th.
Hotaro looks down at the letter from his sister.
She bows slightly.
He sighs, and looks at his empty coffee cup.
Class 1 B students take a test.
Hotaro looks at a 1st Term Midterm schedule. Tuesday tests are crossed out. He studies at night.
Day 2 tests, Study, Day 3 tests, study, day 4 tests
Students collapse. Hotaro sinks into his seat.
He collapses in bed. All midterm exams are crossed off.
He sits up. A letter from Tomoe Oreki sits on the desk.
Shouman, The Greening. When nature waxeth full, and limbs and leaves grow lush.
Auxillary building.
Chitanda and Mayako walk away. Hotaro pulls out a book.
Biology Prep Room.
The girls approach the door. Hotaro rounds the corner, and notices a pair of small, doorbell sized boxes taped to the walls. The boxes have glass squares facing each other.
A tall, casually dressed boy with short brown hair opens the door.
The boy closes the door behind him.
Togato rubs his hands on his pants and looks around, sweating.

Computers are squeezed between boxes. A whiteboard displays Kami High Monthly Newsletter Issue 496. Pens, markers, and a white receiver sit on a desk by the open window. Papers and straight edges lie on a table top, sitting across a pile of boxes. Hotaro stares at Togato, while the girls look around. He spies a pedestal fan by the door, blowing across the makeshift table.
Hotaro looks at the 3 from across the room.
He sweats, making a fist.
Togato slackens
He walks away.
Stacks of books sit on the table in the club room.
The anthology cover depicts a hand drawing of a wolf biting a rabbit, which bites it back.
Chitanda gasps, covering her mouth with her hands. Text appears, the niece of time.
